newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Netanyahu, Arafat meet, shake hands -witness.
newsitem.headline: Netanyahu, Arafat meet, shake hands -witness.

text.p: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu met Palestinian President Yasser Arafat at their first summit on Wednesday, and witnesses said they shook hands.

"They shook hands when they met inside the building," said an Israeli government photographer who witnessed the meeting inside a liaison complex at the Israeli-Gaza Strip border. Israel Television described the handshake as "very lengthy".
